participant_1.name: Liam
participant_1.personality: Ambitious and creative, always striving for success in music while valuing personal time and introspection.
participant_1.background: I will study for my upcoming exams while others may watch some Jacob Sartorius music videos on YouTube. I love animals and I want to help them. I need some time to myself. I practice my guitar for hours every day, hoping to make it big in the local music scene. My father has a very prestigious job.

participant_2.name: Emma
participant_2.personality: Passionate and free-spirited, enjoys expressing creativity through writing and cooking, while valuing independence.
participant_2.background: My family supports me while I pursue my writing career. I am twenty years old. I enjoy cooking up a storm on the weekends and running to clear my head. I still play the drums to keep my hand-eye coordination and stamina in shape. I don’t like feeling controlled.

content.text: Hey there! I'm a musician trying to make it big in the local music scene. How are you?
Hey! I'm a writer trying to make it in the publishing world.
Awesome! What kind of writing do you do?
I write short stories and novels. I'm also working on a memoir right now.
That's really cool! I'm more of a songwriter than a composer.
That's awesome! I love music. I play the drums to keep my hand-eye coordination in shape.
Me too! I play the guitar.
What kind of music do you like to play?
I like to play all kinds of music, but I mostly play rock and roll.
Rock and roll is awesome! I like to play a lot of different genres too.
What's your favorite genre to write?
I like to write fantasy and science fiction.
That's cool! I like those genres too.
Maybe we should collaborate on something!
